icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-infinity"><path d="M12 12c-2-2.67-4-4-6-4a4 4 0 1 0 0 8c2 0 4-1.33 6-4Zm0 0c2 2.67 4 4 6 4a4 4 0 0 0 0-8c-2 0-4 1.33-6 4Z"/></svg>
name: Unlimited
description: Provides free and unlimited times image compression with no restrictions.

name: Fast Compression
description: Compress images with a single click, making it easier to reduce image file sizes without compromising quality.

name: Security
description: Files are deleted within an hour after being uploaded. No data is stored on the server permanently.
